resources.string: Primary: 1 x 165m, 1 x 330m, 1 x 1500m
Secondary: 2 min PES8, 1 min PES3 in the 5km loop. No rest
Dragon Boat: 100m work (starts)
Primary: 1 x 165m, 1 x 330m, 1 x 1500m
Secondary: (1 min on, 30 sec off) x 40 @ 200m pace

Primary: 1 x 165m, 1 x 330m, 1 x 1500m
Secondary: (2 min on, 1 min off) x 20 @ 500m pace

Primary: 1 x 165m, 1 x 330m, 1 x 1500m
Secondary: 5k practice TT
Dragon Boat: 200m work
Primary: 2 x 165m, 2 x 330m
Dragon Boat: Technical work
Primary: 3 strokes, 6 strokes, 10 strokes, x 10, on a minute beep
Dragon Boat: 500m skeletons.
Primary: 6 x 330m, then 1500m
Secondary: DB blade, 120 sec, 30 sec off, 90 sec on, 60 sec off, 60 sec on, 90 sec off, 30 sec on. Rigged on the side you paddle. As hard as you can do it.
Dragon Boat: Starts to 500m transition, 1 500m piece with rhythm, one 500m with rhythm and a finish
Dragon Boat: Blend practice: Starts, 20 sec on, 10 sec off x 6 with lots of rest.
Primary: 3 x 330m, then 1500m.
Secondary: 30 sec on, 60 sec off x 20 PES9 one side, switch sides each piece.
Dragon Boat: Mixed: Wash riding practice. Men: Race statagy, go over calls.
Dragon Boat: Practice starts and transitions to 200m pace, 500m pace, and 2000m pace
Coached: 4 min PES7, 2 min PES3 in 5km loop.
Primary: Last of 330m challenge, or do a 330 piece, 165m, 1500m
Dragon Boat: Practice starts and transitions to 200m pace, 500m pace, and 2000m pace.

Coached: Tuesday Group: 5 km race
Thursday Group: 2 min on 30 sec off x 15 PES7
Primary: 500m in Alcan course, then 1000m from Science World, then 1500m back to Alder Bay dock.
Dragon Boat: All strokes up to 45 sec. Max rate.

Coached: Tuesday Group: 2 min on 30 sec off x 15 PES7
Thursday Group: 5km race
Primary: 1500m from dock to bridge, then 500m in Alcan course, then 1000m from Science World back to pier.
Dragon Boat: Practice starts, then, 15 sec on 10 sec active rest, 15 sec on 15 sec active rest, 15 sec on. Max rate.
Coached: 1 min on 30 sec off x 30 PES8
Primary: 2 x 330m pieces, one can be a challenge, 3 165m, 1500m
Dragon Boat: Practice starts, then, 20 sec on 10 sec active rest times 20 sec on. Max rate.
Coached: Bring a resistor and DB blade. 3 stokes, 6 strokes, 10 strokes, on the minute. x 10. Rigged on the side you paddle.
Primary: 2 x 330m pieces, one can be a challenge, 2 x 165m, 1500m.
Dragon Boat: Accelerate: All strokes up to 40, no transition. Hold at max rate.
Coached: 2 times 1500m turn and go.
Primary: OC blade workout switching sides: 2 x 1000m turn and go, 2 x 500m turn and go. (500m in the Alcan course)
Dragon Boat: Accelerate: All strokes up to 30, no transition. Hold at max rate.
Primary: 2 x 330m pieces, one can be a challenge. 165m, 1500m.
Dragon Boat: Starts: All the strokes up to 20.
Coached: 40 sec on, 20 sec off x 40 PES8. All from full starts, All on the same side, but switch sides every piece. Running starts.
Primary: 330m challenge, or piece, 2 x 165m pieces, 1500m.
Dragon Boat: Starts: All the strokes up to 10.
Coached: 20 sec on, 40 sec off x 40. PES 9. All from full starts. All on the same side, but switch sides every piece. with oc blade.
Primary: 330m challenge, or piece, 165m, 1500m.
Dragon Boat: Individual technique, race plans
Primary: 330m challenge, a 165m race piece and a 1500m race piece, with a db blade, rigged on the side you paddle, not switching sides.
Coached: 5 km steady
Primary: 2 x 2km turn and go
Secondary: No Workout
Coached: 4 min PES7, 2 min PES4, repeating for 5km loop.
Primary: 4 x 1000m turn and go
Secondary: 15 x 2 min on at high tempo with 30 sec rest. Switching sides. First piece @ full start, the rest running.
Coached: 5 km timed race
Primary: Warm up to Cambie bridge, then 3 x 1500m turn and go

Secondary: Fartlek.
60 sec on 20 sec off,
40 sec on 20 sec off,
20 sec on 20 sec off,
20 sec on 40 sec off,
40 sec on 40 sec off,
60 sec on 40 sec off,
20 sec on, 60 sec off,
40 sec on, 60 sec off,
60 sec on. PES10
Coached: Drills with OC blade
Primary: 20 x 40 sec on, 20 sec off. Full start on the first piece, running starts on the following pieces. Alternate sides on each piece. No switching sides during piece. PES9
Secondary: 12 x 3 min on at PES7, 30 sec off, switching sides. First piece @ full start, the rest running.
Coached: Race pieces in Alder Bay, with a DB blade not switching sides, rigged on the side you paddle.

Primary: 3 x 165m, then 3 x 330m
With DB blade, not switching sides, rigged on side you paddle
Secondary: Starts: 3 strokes, 6 strokes, 10 stokes, 20 strokes. PES10. Set watch for 1 min repeat. Go on the beep. Repeat 10 times, with a DB blade not switching sides, rigged on the side you paddle.
Coached: 3 x 1500m turn and go
Primary: 30 x 1min on at PES8, 30 sec off switching sides, first piece full start, the rest running.
Secondary: 5k TT course, using good technique, working on race lines and mental prep.
Coached: 3 x 1500m turn and go

Primary: 2 x 165m, then 2 x 330m
With DB blade, not switching sides, rigged on side you paddle
Secondary: 5 x 1k turn and go
Coached: 2 x 1k turn and go

Primary: 3 x 165m, then 2 x 330m
With DB blade, not switching sides, rigged on side you paddle
Secondary: 5, 4, 3, 2, 1, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 min at high tempo, with 1 min rest in between
Coached: 2 x 2k turn and go

Primary: 2 x 165m, then 2 x 330m
With DB blade, not switching sides, rigged on side you paddle

Secondary: 5(5 min on 2:30 min rest PES8)
Accelerate for 20 strokes on half way mark of every 5 min piece. Like a running start. Or Jericho 10km small boat race.
Coached: 10 x Alder Bay Sprints

Primary: 1 min PES9, 1 min rest
5 min - (1 min PES4, 2 min PES8, 1 min PES6, 1 min PES2) 2 min rest

Primary: 2(16(1 min on 30 sec rest) 4 min rest) PES9
Secondary: 2(8(2 min on 30 sec rest) 4 min rest) PES8
Coached: 1 165m time trial at PES10 with an OC blade, followed by a 330m time trial PES9 with an OC blade.
